statements: SELECT * FROM tax_credits_expenses ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, expense_amount FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE credit_received > 0;
SELECT student_id, expense_amount FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE date_received > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense FROM tax_credits_expenses;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_name, expense_amount, credit_received FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE credit_received >= 100 ORDER BY credit_received DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_name, expense_amount FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 1000 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits_expenses WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND credit_received > 50 AND expense_amount < 300 ORDER BY student_id, date_received DESC;
SELECT course_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM tax_credits_expenses GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_expense > 1000 ORDER BY total_expense DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits;
SELECT credit_name, amount FROM tax_credits WHERE credit_id = 1;
SELECT deduction_name, amount FROM deductions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT credit_name, amount FROM tax_credits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM deductions WHERE deduction_id = 5;
SELECT credit_id, credit_name, amount FROM tax_credits WHERE credit_id = 1;
SELECT credit_name, amount, credit_id FROM tax_credits WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT deduction_name, amount FROM deductions WHERE deduction_id = 3 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits WHERE amount <= 1000;
SELECT credit_id, credit_name, amount FROM tax_credits WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits;
SELECT student_name, credit_amount FROM tax_credits ORDER BY credit_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM deductions WHERE amount_spent > 1000;
SELECT student_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, deduction_type, amount_spent FROM deductions WHERE student_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY amount_spent ASC;
SELECT credit_id, student_name, tax_year, credit_amount FROM tax_credits WHERE credit_amount > 500 ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM deductions WHERE deduction_type = 'Healthcare' AND amount_spent BETWEEN 100 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
SELECT student_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_expenses > 2000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT student_name, deduction_type, amount_spent FROM deductions WHERE amount_spent > 500 AND deduction_type LIKE '%Office%' ORDER BY deduction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND tax_year = 2021 ORDER BY credit_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM educational_expenses;
SELECT student_id, expense_amount FROM educational_expenses ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT expense_type FROM educational_expenses;
SELECT * FROM tax_credits WHERE credit_amount > 1000;
SELECT student_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM educational_expenses GROUP BY student_id HAVING SUM(expense_amount) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM educational_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC, expense_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM educational_expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Books' ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(credit_amount) AS total_credits FROM tax_credits GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_credits > 500;
SELECT student_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT student_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM educational_expenses JOIN deductions ON educational_expenses.student_id = deductions.student_id WHERE deductions.deduction_amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM TaxCredits;
SELECT credit_id, credit_amount FROM TaxCredits WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, deduction_amount, deduction_type FROM Deductions WHERE deduction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY deduction_amount ASC;
SELECT form_id, form_type, form_status FROM TaxForms WHERE student_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'active';
SELECT student_name, graduation_year FROM Students ORDER BY graduation_year DESC;
SELECT credit_id, student_id, credit_amount FROM TaxCredits WHERE credit_amount > 1000;
SELECT form_id, form_type, form_status FROM TaxForms WHERE form_status = 'submitted' ORDER BY form_id DESC;
SELECT deduction_type, SUM(deduction_amount) AS total_deduction FROM Deductions GROUP BY deduction_type;
